version_description:
Introducing lesson draft syncing!
• Access your saved drafts on all devices with your Educreations account
• Support for Apple Classroom, managed accounts, and iCloud Keychain
• Updates for the most recent versions of iOS
• Improved reliability when uploading and download drafts and lessons (version 2.2.9)
• Improved Google authentication (version 2.2.9)
• Improved image search reliability on school networks (version 2.2.10)
• Support for Clever Instant Login (version 2.2.10)
• Document import fixes for Dropbox and Google Drive (version 2.2.10)
• Bug fixes (version 2.2.10)

Added support for all the new iPads!
• Now supports multi-tasking and drag and drop
• Updates for the most recent versions of iOS
• Added more file and document import types
• Improved recording and playback reliability
• Bug fixes
